column4: can you help me? im trying to boot from the ubuntu cd, but i get the console and when i type startx i get no screens found
that's a very recent thinkpad isn't it?
and choose the vesa driver for video. leave all other options at their default highlighted values. then, try startx command again.
i added it manually and then it doesnt start again
in that case i have no idea. sorry man, cant help
